title: Understanding $$\frac{Substance}{Medication}-Induced$$ Psychotic Disorder
text: This disorder is characterized by the presence of hallucinations or delusions that occur soon after the use, intoxication, withdrawal, or exposure to a substance or medication.

hintAnswer: the presence of hallucinations or delusions soon after use, intoxication, withdrawal, or exposure to a substance or medication
title: Identifying Symptoms
text: What are the key symptoms of a $$\frac{substance}{medication}-induced$$ psychotic disorder?
choices: the presence of hallucinations or delusions soon after use, intoxication, withdrawal, or exposure to a substance or medication
the presence of delusions, hallucinations, disorganized speech, disorganized behavior, and negative symptoms for at least one month but less than six months
